oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Miss Patricia Michel and Mrs. Indu Bhimani model traditonal clothing from other countries.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Miss Patricia Michel, of Troy, NY, is on the left modelling a replica of clothing worn by Katrina Van Der Heyden. Van Der Heyden lived in Troy in the late eighteenth century and was a member of the Van Der Heyden family who once owned the land now occupied by Russell Sage College. Mrs. Indu Bhimani, of Schenectady, models a pale blue georgette sari with a border of red and gold thread that she brought from Bombay, India. They appreared at a tea on behalf of the Campus Chest Drive at Russell Sage College.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph is of the first four male graduates of Russell Sage College.
